# 2nd Avenue Rowhomes

## Description
2nd Avenue Rowhomes is a premium, 2024-built rowhome community in Fort Dodge, Iowa, located at 2009 2nd Ave N. It features 1-bedroom and 2-bedroom units with private exterior walk-up entries, eliminating shared hallways for maximum privacy.

## Key Features
- **Privacy Premium**: No shared hallways, private entrances.
- **Location**: "The 3-Minute Life" â€” 3 minutes to Trinity Regional Medical Center, Hy-Vee, Target, and downtown.
- **Modern Construction**: Completed in 2024 with CUPACLAD natural slate exteriors.
- **Amenities**: In-unit or on-site laundry, stainless steel appliances, individual HVAC, fiber internet ready.
- **Unit Types**:
  - Type A: 1 Bedroom Flat
  - Type B: 2 Bedroom Concise (Two-story)
  - Type C: 1 Bedroom Flat
  - Type D: 1 Bedroom ADA Compliant
  - Type R: 1 Bedroom Up (Second floor)

## Pricing & Availability
Pricing and promotions are dynamically updated via Airtable integration on the website.
- Contact: (515) 400-0376
- Website: https://2ndaverowhomes.com

## Policies
- Equal Housing Opportunity.
- Pet friendly (contact for details).
- Strict non-smoking policy.
